Name: Siddaramaiah
Tweet: Election is supposed to be an open season for false allegations. But why should it be? Why should anybody get away with lies, election or no election?  As a follower of Basavanna I will insist on “ಹುಸಿಯ ನುಡಿಯಲು ಬೇಡ”  I will pursue the case.   https://t.co/1tHpUJTjus via @htTweets
